ygData.subject: Re: Lullaby interrupting casters
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, lullaby DOES seem to interrupt lizards, but it s very infrequent for some reason.  I think the nod has to happen at some precise moment, or it
ygData.messageBody:
John Kim wrote:

> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> Hey folks, I discovered last night that while Lullaby does not
> interrupt the lizard casters in Cazic (debatable whether this
> is a change to Lullaby in general, or lizards are just immune
> or resistant due to shorter casting times), Pixie Strike
> *does* interrupt them.

Actually, lullaby DOES seem to interrupt lizards, but it's very infrequent
for some reason. I think the nod has to happen at some precise moment, or
it doesn't work.

Pixie strike is much better, if it's feasible at the time.

Jyzan
